mapper.select: select aobcam.id,fbc.name,(fbc.state)status,b.username as approval from app_org_buy_channel_approve_middle aobcam left join app_auth_org aao on aao.id=aobcam.app_org_id left join fy_buy_channel fbc on fbc.id=aobcam.buy_channel_id left join app_purchase_approve apa on apa.id=aobcam.purchase_approve_id left join (select GROUP_CONCAT(a.user_name order by tid) as username,a.zid as app_purchase_approve_id from (SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(z.purchase_approve_list,',',t.help_topic_id+1),',',-1) AS num,au.user_name,au.id,z.id as zid,t.help_topic_id+1 as tid FROM zkfy.app_purchase_approve z join mysql.help_topic t join zkfy.app_user au WHERE (LENGTH(z.purchase_approve_list)-LENGTH(REPLACE(z.purchase_approve_list,',',''))+1) > t.help_topic_id having au.id=num) a) b on b.app_purchase_approve_id = apa.id where app_org_id='1204069409234190336'
